name: Attacksketball
description:
Attacksketball is basketball without the the basket

TO RUN

Download zip file, extract and run builds

CONTROLS WITH XBOX CONTROLLERS

Without ball

control stick to move, x for low hit, y for high hit , a is to dash

With ball

control stick to move, x or y to block ,

CONTROLS ON KEYBOARD

Player 1

WASD to move, E to punch, R to kick, Q to dash

Player 2

IJKL to move, O to punch, P to kick, U to dash
